channel.title: Barstow|San Bernardino County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Barstow|San Bernardino County|California|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South at CA-247
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 183 offramp at CA-247 jct. Turn left for CA-247, Barstow Road.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 183
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 183 - CA-247/Barstow Road. Use CA-247 south for Lucerne Valley and Big Bear Lake.

item.title: End I-40 West Approaching I-15 Exit 183
item.description: End I-40 west at I-15. Approaching I-15 Exit 183 - CA-247/Barstow Road.

item.title: I-40 West - Last I-40 Shield
item.description: Last I-40 shield on I-40 west, just west of Exit 1.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 1 - East Main St.

item.title: I-40 West - I-15/CA-58 Access
item.description: Approaching Exit 1 on I-40 west. There is no direct connection from I-40 west to I-15 north. For I-15 North/Las Vegas access, use Exit 1 (Main St.). For I-15 South/To CA-58 West/San Bernardino continue west on I-40.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 1
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 1 - East Main St.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching I-15
item.description: I-40 west approaching I-15. Use Exit 1 for I-15 north. Continue west on I-40 for I-15 south.

item.title: I-40 West - California
item.description: I-40 West - California shield in Barstow.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exit 1
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 1 - East Main St. East Main St. is part of Business Loop I-15.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 2
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 2 - Marine Corps Logistics Base.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 2
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 2 - Marine Corps Logistics Base.
